title: @Riot, which came first?

replies.body: Their kits came first, then we made sure the video captured a bunch of their abilities.
Holy Carp, I wasn't actually expecting an answer... O.o  Thanks!
they have big butts:..wow..i thought they were human..not half goats:|
They're part bird, not part goat, and they're vastaya, why did you ever think they were human?
